about_the_game:
Shan Hai: Mythic Origins:

Based on the mythological stories of the Shan Hai Jing, this is a cooperative multiplayer Roguelike game. You and your friends will travel into the ancient mythological world to explore the original secrets of the myths. In the game, you will play as adventurers with abilities over metal, wood, water, fire, and earth, battling various mythical creatures in the world of Shan Hai Jing, capturing and taming them to fight alongside you. You will also craft powerful weapons and equipment, uncover the secrets of ancient mythology, and ultimately save the world.

Powerful Five Elements Spells:

The five mysterious forces of metal, wood, water, fire, and earth are interconnected through mutual generation and restriction. While you may counter your enemies, you can also be countered by them. By wisely selecting the correct attribute inlay fragments, you can make your weapons incredibly powerful. Additionally, you and your friends can unleash various stunning combo skills based on the interrelation of the elements.

Cooperative Roguelike:

The game supports up to 4-player online team play, featuring rich Roguelike elements, ensuring that every challenge with your friends is a unique and fresh experience.

Varied Mythical Creatures:

In the game, you and your friends will fight alongside various mythical creatures from the Shan Hai Jing. During battles, you might even acquire mysterious beast eggs. Once the eggs hatch, you will fight alongside the baby creatures, eventually raising them into powerful allies.

Mystical Weapon Crafting System:

The game features a variety of mystical weapons, equipment, and spirit stones that can be combined to gain different abilities. You can upgrade, evolve, and break through to forge ancient artifacts with extraordinary power.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 or AMD FX 8320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDA GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
